records.story: A meteor like object falling from the sky with a smoke trail that stops instantly and appears to be a green light hovering then gone. It was 9:45pm on 1/31/2011 as I was driving down Philips hwy when I looked up at the sky and noticed a meteor looking object falling from the sky with a small smoke trail, maybe coming from engines but then it stopped almost instantly and there was no more smoke or fire, just a faint shining green light hovering in the sky, and a second later it took off again this time with no smoke or trail, it just zoomed out like it went into warp speed and disappeared.

records.summary: 2 orange balls traveling over Jacksonville Florida
records.story: 2 orange balls traveling over Jacksonville Florida I saw 2 orange circles traveling from South to North.  I live southeast of Jacksonville by 10 miles, and their path was west of me by approximately 1-2 miles.  They travelled approximately 10 miles from south to north during my observation.  They were not at exactly the same altitude but were fairly close.  They had no blinking lights and made no sound.  They looked almost like you would expect after-burners to look on a jet fighter, but there was no sound at all.  The size of the light was too big to come from an airplane, and the speed at which they traveled was too fast for a helicopter.  I’m not sure what these were, but they looked very similar to those I found on youtube videos when I searched for “Orange UFO”. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Bright Light Southwest of Jacksonville, AR
records.story: Bright Light Southwest of Jacksonville,  AR Saw a bright light through the trees that has never been there before. While watching the object which was a very bright, white light, I could see it was making up and down moves.  I went in and got my binoculars while my neighbor watched it. We watched with the binoculars and could definitely see it moving downwards.  My neighbor noticed two other set of lights at the 10 O'Clock and 2 O'Clock positions above it.   The other two lights were red and green in color. While watching the bright light through the binoculars, it went from a single light to 5 lights in a pentagon shape, and then it went back to a solid light.   We watched it for about 30 minutes until it went below the tree line.  I live very near the Little Rock AFB, and the bright light was in the southwest of my house in the direction of the far end of the runway.  When the bright light dipped below the tree line, I could still see the two green and red object at the exact 10 and 2 positions above w! here the bright light dipped below the tree line.   Coincidentally, two C-130 aircraft flew in after the bright light dipped below the tree line. They were flying in the direction of the bright light, and then they did a U-turn over the base and flew in the opposite direction of the light.  Coincidence??  No C-130s in the area while the bright light was glowing.  I tried to take a photo, but couldn't focus on it with the digital camera. I got one blurry photo.

records.summary: Single golden diamond shaped object, very fast.
records.story: Single golden diamond shaped object, very fast. 1 multi-tiered diamond shaped object flew over my house at 12:10 in the morning.  I noticed it outside my window as it flew from the south heading directly north. The object was very fast and had a gold haze around it.   Weather was clear at the time and me and my mom both watched the object for about 3 minutes before we completely lost sight of it. I immediately began looking for a way to report the sighting once I could sort my thoughts.  The experience was very frightening and even caused me to lose my breath for awhile. I do not wear glasses but my mom does, we both clearly saw the object as it passed by very close, she was wearing her glasses at the time as she had just got home from work. ((NUFORC Note:  Date is flawed.  We have asked the source of the report to provide the correct date.  Correct date may be July 12, we believe, and we have altered the original date, to reflect that possibility.  PD))

records.summary: Ball of light, west of city, was wiggling, observed for 20 min.  ((NUFORC Note:  Sighting of Venus?  PD))
records.story: Ball of light, west of city, was wiggling, observed for 20 min. I was on break at work, was looking out to the west from my position on the north west part of the city. was a cloudy evening, no stars we visible at this time, and I seen a very bright ball of light which appeared to been wiggling in the sky.  The object never moved from its position as I observed it for about 20 min.  When I took my next break 1hr 30 min later the object was gone.  I watched the skies for the next week and never seen it again. ((NUFORC Note:  Sighting of Venus?  Curiously, the source of the report indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Triangle over the St John's River
records.story: Triangle over the St John's River I was driving home from St Augustine, FL to my home on the west side of Jacksonville, FL.  I was traveling west on I-295 approaching the Buckman Bridge when I saw a light that I thought to be a helicopter out over the St Johns River to the south.   As the object got closer to the bridge, I could that it was a very large pitch black triangle shape that was moving in a north westerly direction.  It looked like a triangle shaped black hole against the night sky and clouds.  It at first had one bright white light then changed into 3 dim yellowish lights.   It was still out over the water as I traveled on and out of sight.  It was a really dark night with rain and some lightning.  The black triangle shape really stood out against the low clouds over the river.  It was more than a hundred feet long and a couple of hundred feet from the water.   Very odd, kinda freaked out. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: A friend and I were driving home from work late one early morning in mid-august and were stuck at a red light that doesn't normally cha
records.story: A friend and I were driving home from work late one early morning in mid-august and were stuck at a red light that doesn't normally change when there are so few cars on the road.  We were stopped right next to a woman in a car by herself.  All of a sudden a huge ball of incredibly bright, white light appeared directly in front of us, in the sky but not very high up.  My friend and I were freaking out and we glanced over at the lady next to us who was very clearly witnessing the same thing.  We looked back at the light which had been hovering in front of us for about 30 seconds, then it suddenly zoomed away.  Much faster than any aircraft can possibly go, and it vanished.  It's not much but it's one experience I will never forget. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Orange Lights in the Jacksonville Sky
records.story: Orange Lights in the Jacksonville Sky My husband and I were driving home towards the Wonderwood bridge area in Jacksonville FL., when we saw no less that 20 orange spheres in the sky, which were symmetrical. At first I thought it was just the lights on the power lines.  Then I saw one of the lights turn to a brighter orange and pick up speed and move at a fast pace across the sky off into the distance.  While the other ones were a paler orange and they remained in the same spot.  If they were moving it was not at a fast pace. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: FIVE ORANGE, PURPLE, AND COBALT AND WHITE BALLS OF LIGHT FLASHED ACROSS NIGHT SKY.
records.story: FIVE ORANGE, PURPLE, AND COBALT AND WHITE BALLS OF LIGHT FLASHED ACROSS NIGHT SKY. I WENT OUT AT NIGHT TO TAKE PHOTOS OF OUR CACTUS PLANT THAT ONLY BLOOMS AT NIGHT.  THERE WERE FIVE BRIGHT, COLORFUL BALLS OF LIGHT FLASHED ACROSS THE NIGHT SKY.  THEY ALL LEFT TRAILS, AS IF TRAVELING AT A HIGH RATE OF SPEED.  ONE BALL WAS BRIGHT ORANGE, ONE VIOLET, ONE WHITE W/COBALT HUE, ONE WAS A DIMMER/DARKER SHADE OF ORANGE (AS IF FARTHER AWAY, AND NOT AS BRIGHT), AND ANOTHER WAS SORT OF GRAY AND DIMMER AS WELL.   SEVEN PHOTOGRAPHS WERE TAKEN IN IMMEDIATE, RAPID SUCCESSION, BUT ONLY THE FIRST PHOTO REVEALED THESE BALLS OF LIGHT.  THE OTHER SIX PHOTOS JUST SHOWED A DARK, SKY W/NO STARS.  THESE LIGHTS MUST HAVE BEEN TRAVELING AT AN EXTREMELY HIGH RATE OF SPEED BECAUSE THEY WERE NOT VISIBLE WITH THE NAKED EYE, AND I ONLY SAW THEM IN MY PICTURES ONCE DEVELOPED.

records.summary: white light  ascends vertically
records.story: white light  ascends vertically Saw a bright white light approaching from my northwest.  I initially assumed it to be an approaching plane from the Huntsville area.  As the light reached almost due west, it flashed and instatly began a near vertical ascent.  The light visible during ascent (from what I now believed to be the bottom of this object) appeared reddish in color.  The reddish light got increasing smaller as it ascended and finally disappeared

records.summary: Bright green small object traveling North to South.
records.story: Bright green small object traveling North to South. A bright green object moved across the Eastern sky over the ocean approximately 35 degrees above the horizon traveling in a North to South direction at a high rate of speed.

records.summary: A light hovered in the sky two nights, moving back and forth.
records.story: A light hovered in the sky two nights, moving back and forth. 12/38/11 a light in the sky stated to become brighter and brighter until it seem to be at least 5 times brighter than any star or planet.  There were absolutely no stars in the sky at the time. The craft hovered for around 15 minutes before the object became dimmer and took off into the east. The next night, the same light was in the sky, this time not as bright.  The object made no noise whatsoever, and seemed as if it was moving back and forth.  The object stayed in the sky about 5 minutes before disappearing.

records.summary: Fleets holding position
records.story: Fleets holding position 	 Every night in the Jacksonville, Florida Skies  A few weeks ago while star gazing, i started noticing that most of them were moving. Not in the direction of our planets rotation, but rather racing back n forth, turning on 90 degree n less angle turns. Also swaying back n forth. The movement from here on the ground would travel to what appears up to be about 1" to 1-1/2" before turning or curving back around in a different direction. That doesn't sound like much distance but if you consider that these objects are in our atmosphere, a star moving 1-1/2" in the sky must be a pretty good distance of travel. And the speed that they travel this distance must be great as well. They seem to be in patterns and holding there positions for the most part and have been there a while now.... As crazy as it sounds and appeared to me myself, I had to get some other person/s to see this as well to insure i wasn't seeing things. So I had my kids come out as well as a few of their friends to see these objects as well.. The did in fact see t! hem and noticed there movements just as I was... I myself do not the equipment or resources to film these objects, but believe someone should try to document them with a high powered telescopic/camera. Just have to get this out there n tell someone...Thanks...If you witness this as well please comment back, also if you have the equipment to document this please send me a copy...Thanks again...

records.summary: Numerous (I5-20) solid red-orange flare-like lights over Jacksonville in about a 2 minute period.
records.story: numerous (I5-20) solid red-orange flare-like lights over Jacksonville in about a 2 minute period. I happened to look out the window and see 3-4 solid red fireballs (not flashing like a plane) floating in pretty close together.  I said, "what the heck is that?" and proceeded to get up and have a better look....at that point, I noticed that there were more--many more--coming behind the first that I'd seen.  I called the rest of the family and we all stood on our deck and watched.  It was very surreal as it appeared we were being invaded!   I'm guessing they were flares, but I'm not sure now that I've seen so many similar reports.  I'd say they were each about the size of Venus or Jupiter on a good night, reddish/orange, solid (no blinks) and just seemed to dissipate like a flare might.  But there were at least 15-18 total that we saw in about a 2 minute period, really.  They just kept coming, one set behind the other.

records.summary: My wife, daughter, and I witness a bright object moving North-North-East in the sky. It was a bluish-white colored light and stayed vis
records.story: My wife, daughter, and I witness a bright object moving North-North-East in the sky. It was a bluish-white colored light and stayed visible for a few minutes.  It appeared to be large and even though my blackberry camera has a hard time picking up stars and such in the evening sky, i was able to get a picture and a video.  Not sure how good the video will turn out but you can clearly make out what looks like a star in the picture.  Also, there was no sound when this object flew overhead nor did it have flashing lights leading me to believe it was not a plane or helicopter.

records.summary: Disk-on-disk UFO making atmosphere around it pulsate
records.story: disk-on-disk UFO making atmosphere around it pulsate In the backyard of my house, my brother and I were grilling out at around 6 p.m.  While waiting for our burgers to cook, we were shooting off some left over bottle rockets we found from independence day.  As he launched his bottle rocket off, something caught my eye.  I noticed an object flying what seemed to be a little to low for a normal airline plane. I noticed that it was slow moving and not shaped like an airline's aircraft and it had no exhaust trail and made no noise.  I pointed this object out to my brother and both of us were dumbfounded by this event.  Hat was most fascinating to me about this object is that it seemed to run an odd path in the sky and the atmosphere surrounding the object appeared distorted such as the heat waves you would see radiating off of hot pavement.  It didn't distort in a heat-wave type pattern though.  It was more of a pulsating visual as though it were bending light rays from its form of propulsion. The object seemed to be a dull metallic disk, with a smaller disk stacked on top of it, and it moved in a smooth elliptical path heading north before slowly, and gradually, decreasing in size until it finally disappeared. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Blob when you see it throw a telescope.
records.story: bright light blob when you see it throw a telescope.

records.summary: Fluorescent green streak in jacksonville sky
records.story: Fluorescent green streak in jacksonville sky A fluorescent green streak in the south to southwestern sky above the Southside Blvd area of Jacksonville, FL.  It appeared out of the clouds and disappeared back into the clouds in the span of about 5 seconds and there was a similar colored trail following it as it disappeared back into the clouds. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Rectangular silver/gray spacecraft hovering close to land with no sound.  ((NUFORC Note:  Date of event not indicated by source.  PD))
records.story: Rectangular silver/gray spacecraft hovering close to land with no sound As I pulled out of my driveway heading east I saw lights in the sky.  My 1st thought was it was a plane.  As I drove closer   I could see a gray/silver spacecraft,hovering with no sound.  There were lights shining from the front & back (outwards & pointing downwards) off this spacecraft.It was big & so close to the ground.  I was afraid to drive by it for fear it might suck me and my vehicle up in it.   I drove past fast looking back in my mirror and out the window, nothing was seen!   I told only a few people and now wished I would have thought to stop and video taped it.  It all happened so fast and I remember being scared.  I have been reluctant to tell any one. I just sorta dismissed to "I do not know what to think."   A friend said imagine all the people that have seen things & probably do not report it.  So I figured I would share this ((NUFORC Note:  Date of event not indicated by source.  PD))

records.summary: Disc shaped saucer seen inside a glowing orange ball of light in Jacksonville, florida.
records.story: Disc shaped saucer seen inside a glowing orange ball of light in Jacksonville, florida. My Husband and I were out in our backyard.  We see an orange glowing ball of light  - kind of reminiscent of fire.  It was moving towards us at first and got to about 1/4 of a mile away.  The craft was approiximately 500 feet up and we could see a definite saucer shaped craft encased within the orange glowing sphere. It almost seemed like a hologram but was not.  Once it got to about 1/4 mile from us, it turned and continued to go fairly slowly around the tree tops and out behind our property where it disappeared.  This craft was completely soundless.

records.summary: Fast moving object w/ a bauitiful orange aura that seemed to pulsate travaling at high rate of speed.
records.story: a fast moving object w/ a bauitiful orange aura that seemed to pulsate travaling at high rate of speed. 2/19/12 around 12:15-12:35am i seen a brillent orange object.  It made no sound that i heard and stayed a constent speed as the object travaled East/North East.  Its speed was fast compared to the distence it travaled across the sky.  There was no blinking ID lights like on an aircraft just this beautiful orange aura around the object that appeared to pulsate.  The object was about the size of a tennis ball from my location to the object.

records.summary: Bright circular light in the sky with glowing lights around the object.
records.story: Bright circular light in the sky with glowing lights around the object. Last night after we put the girls to bed, my mother, sister and I went out on the front porch to have a cigarette,   While we we talking, we noticed a round shape in the sky moving faster than a normal plane or helicopter, around the right side and bottom of the glowing white, ball-like shape was a neon bluish, green light, the lights were squiggly, bottom one looked almost like a sideways S shape, the glow of the lines were very noticeable.  When asking each other what it could be, my mother said, SHHHH, listen to the engine, but could not hear the aircraft or whatver it was in the sky.   First time seeing anything like this.  Strange.

records.summary: 21:00 pair of objects seen in sky. Moved diagonally and in sync against cloud motion. ((NUFORC Note:  Jupiter and Venus.  PD))
records.story: 21:00 pair of objects seen in sky. Moved diagonally and in sync against cloud motion. No colors noted. Near 21:00, noticed 2 abnormally bright stars in sky directly to the right of Orion's belt.  Over the course of 20 minutes, the object(s), which moved in sync, moved diagonally at about a 45 degree angle until they passed out of our sight behind trees.  The objects were moving against the few clouds, and at a much faster speed then the background starfield.  They were diagonally positioned to one another as well, the right one being lower.  There were two other craft in our field of vision at the time we saw these.  It is difficult to know what type of craft were there, or if they were in pursuit or observing the objects.

records.summary: Circle Appears from cloud cover and moves west.  Photos available
records.story: Circle Appears from cloud cover and moves west.  Photos available I took a series of 5 photos of a gorgeous sunset from my back deck on July 12.  I didn't notice this object while I was taking the shots, but it shows up in several and appears to be moving across the sky.   I have tried to enlarge it to get details but only end up with a circle.  This circle is first seen at the edge of a cloud and in successive photos appears to move west.   I will try and forward the photo set which will have an incorrect date.  The shots were taken within a 3 minute time span.  I hesitated to file this report because I thought it may be a natural object.  When I read a post dated that evening in Atalla, AL, which is about 20 miles away, I decided the photos may be of some significance.

records.summary: I saw fireball like objects in the sky on New Year's Eve.  I saw atleast two that night. It was like slow moving, flickering.
records.story: I first saw fireball like objects in the sky on New Year's Eve.  I saw at least two that night. It was like slow moving, flickering fireballs that were low in the sky.  Seemingly way lower than your average plane and after 30 seconds or so, as I am trying to figure out what it is they flicker out and completely disappear.  The reason why I am reporting this is because I just saw the exact same thing and googled it and found all these similar reports. Tonight I only saw one.   Same exact thing.  Slow moving, flickering like a fireball, I initially thought it resembled what the average person identifies as a comet.  Then just appeared to almost "burn out". I've talked to several people about it because we have a naval base local.  But tonight a clearly US aircraft was flying towards this right as I saw it......there is no way this is not something recognized on US radar.  Clearly. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: 4 orange glowing, non flickering spheres, very crisp and clear.
records.story: 4 orange glowing, non flickering spheres, very crisp and clear. Was returning home from work and passing a radio station and tower on the East edge of town.  Was going over a bridge over the rail road tracks and Sighted a Single light a few hundred feet above my car.  First i thought it was beacon light on transmitter tower and realized it was solid orange and not the tower light.  As i got to the top of the bridge I looked back forward and Saw 3 more. orange brightly glowing spheres.  Weather was extremely foggy and could only see a few hundred feet in any direction.  This is a 2 lane road i was on and couldnt jsut stop.  I slowed to about 15 miles and hour and was leaning forward to look up at them thru the windshield.  I had already past the first. the other 3 were in view. lasted 20 seconds at most.  But they were 2-3 ft round spheres glowing a bright but defined and non-flickering orange light.  At first i wanted to believe they were chinese lanters.  But they were smooth round, and orange no flickering. they were moving east-south east fairly slowly.  It was a calm foggy light.  Once i got home <approx 2 minutes later> I decided to go look for them again. I drove around the area for 10-15 minutes stopping and looking all the way to the interstate and did not see them again.

records.summary: Bright light makes 90 degree turn.
records.story: Bright light makes 90 degree turn. Coming home from boot camp in a friends car traveling south on Interstate 95.  I was in the back seat looking up at the stars. I spotted a bright light that was moving.  At first I thought it was a satellite.   I watched it for about 10 minutes and told the other guys in the car that I think I spotted a satellite.  We kept watching it move when all of a sudden it made an exact 90 degree turn.  Now as far as I know nothing man made can make a movement like that.  I know it's a little late in the game to report this but I had no source back then to report it to.   I was always skeptical about UFO's until then.  That incident certainly changed my mind. ((NUFORC Note:  Date may be approximate.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Jacksonville, Fla spots red/yellow glow in night sky with changing, slower velocity and then going black
records.story: Jacksonville, Fla spots red/yellow glow in night sky with changing, slower velocity and then going black I am a science teacher and tonight, as I entered the house just after dusk, I noticed a large, bullet shaped object coming towards my part of the overhead atmosphere.  At it's speed I first thought it to be a helicopter, due to size and altitude, but it had no noise and no visible tapering tail end.  It was shaped more like a ahort bullet and glowed reddish/orange/yellow as if it were extremely warm.  It was not a meteor.  It did not travel in a straight path but rather moved slowly on an angle, as if to steer it self a bit and then straighten out again.  I had enought time to call a witness to this from in the house. As the oject moved over head it appeared to pulse with this heat while it seemed like it was losing some of that heat.  It was moving slowly, like a slow helicopter speed.  As it pulled away finally, after 2 minutes, it started to cool and slowly went black, not to relight.  I looked to watch it then continue on it's way, as black stone looking object as if it never been lighted in the 1st place. This object had no flaming, fireball tail and did not appear to be disintergrating.  It just looked aglow and seemed to pulsate with reddish/yellow heat.  Moving at a rather astonishly slow clip. Once black, it drifted out of sight to the north. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Three very bright orange lights above the tree lines traveling in the same pattern and direction.
records.story: Three very bright orange lights above the tree lines traveling in the same pattern and direction. On Saturday night, my fiancee and I were sitting out on the front porch chatting.  Suddenly a very bright orange light caught my attention above the tree line on the opposite side of the street.  We both were astonished as we got up from the porch walking to the back of the house to keep the light in sight as it travelled over the house.  It appeared to descend and turn dark as it dissapeared behind the woods.  Just as we could no longer view it we turned and immediatly noticed two more identical lights travelling in the same pattern and direction as the first one.  The first of these lights seemed to have a haze over the top, and all were equally bright.  Immediately, we jumped into the car and attempted to follow these lights, however they dissapeared rather quickly.  My first thought was that perhaps they were associated with the military base, however I quickly realized that the only aircraft associated with the base are helicopters, and these lights certainly were not helicopters. I have seen the military aircraft every day of my life for the past thirty years, however have never wittnessed anything like this.  I believe the lights came from the west, were extremely bright, and made no sound.  As the lights appeared to be descending behind the woods they appeared to fade or darken and the shape seemed to be something of an elongated sphere.  I am not good with size or distance, however I would describe them as being the size of a smoke detector held at approximately two arms lengths.  Upon returning home, I called my Dad who happens to be a pilot and asked if he knew of any aircraft that had bright orange lights, he did not.  I also called my son as he is in the Air Force and asked him the same question.  His response was also the same.   I am still puzzled over what I have seen. Wish I had an answer.

records.summary: UFO sighting in Jacksonville, FL
records.story: UFO sighting in Jacksonville, FL My girlfriend and I were poolside by ourselves the night of July 10, 2013 in lounge chairs staring up at the beautiful night sky in Jacksonville, Florida.   At approximately 10:22pm high above us in the sky above cloud level we witnessed a spherical egg shaped type object appear and then vanish within a few seconds.  It was an unusual bright yellow color unlike the bright white lights of normal flying objects.   Immediately we both knew we had witnessed something special and unique.  We knew it was something we could never forget.

records.summary: Oval shaped craft with blunt ends no lights, completely black.
records.story: Oval shaped craft with blunt ends no lights, completely black In early February, 2013, I stepped out my front door with my Jack Russell terrier so he could do his business one last time for the night.  As I recall, it was around 2200 and the moon was nearly full and there was some sporadic cloud cover. The front of my home faces east and it is located about twenty five miles west of the Atlantic ocean and about eighty miles north of Cape Canaveral. As I gazed up at the moon, I observed a dark, elliptical shaped object silently pass in front of the moon, almost blotting it out, and then disappear in the cloud cover.  I was able to view the object for approximately two seconds, as it crossed south to north.  It was hard to gauge its size, but the impression I was left with was that the object was very large; it was oval shaped in the middle, but the ends were blunt, or square. I quickly dismissed the object as being an aircraft because it had no wings or navigation lights.  The object was completely blacked out.  It was several days before I mentioned the sighting to my wife, who met my revelation with a very perplexed expression.  We’ve been married for twenty three years and she served twenty of my twenty one years in the Marine Corps married to me, not to mention the past seven years that I have been a police officer, and my wife knows I am not easily impressionable, prone to exaggeration, or likely to joke about such things. Occasionally I have caught glimpses of shuttle launches from my front yard, but I truly cannot explain what it was that I saw that night in February.

records.summary: Reddish-yellow elongated diamond star-sized lights moving in elongated V formation against night sky that gradually disappeared.
records.story: reddish-yellow elongated diamond star-sized lights moving in elongated V formation against night sky that gradually disappeared I was just out in my backyard around 9:40 pm Saturday, February 8th looking at the evening sky-some low clouds, a clear moom, stars bright against the night sky.  And then I noticed these lights, as bright and slightly larger than the stars, the color of a lit match- something between red and yellowor, like a hot orange.  There were 5 or 6 of them moving steadily from right to left in an elongated V formaton at a moderately steady pace.  The one furthest to the right was highest with the next one slightly lower, the next lower still, the next dropping much lower, the next much higher and the last higher still. They weren’t blinking or alternating color like lights from a plane, neither was there any noise like helicopters make.  I followed them as they moved across the sky until they were blocked by large tree, so I went out into the street to follow them and noticed two or three of them were gone.  I watched the ones remaining as they continued their path across the sky and noticed that one by one, from the right to the left, they were becoming fainter, losing color until they disappeared.  And then they were gone.. It was truly the strangest thing I’ve ever seen and have no idea what they were.  I’m not one for conspiracy theories and figure there’s an explaination other than extraterrestial, but I’m totally at a loss for what it is.  When I did a search online, I was shocked to find so many hits of similar sittings over the last year and from many locations across the country.

records.summary: Large gray triangular aircraft following florida air gaurd jet.
records.story: large gray triangular aircraft following florida air gaurd jet I was on a industrial bldg. rooftop,working on HVAC PM's,I noticed two florida air national gaurd jets,one heading south,and one heading north,they were east of me and I was about 17 miles inland,they both were leaveing solid condensate trails as it was a fairly humid morning,just after they passed each other I noticed a battleship gray colored triangle with a circular structure in the exact center,it was following the northbound jet,but was at a higher elevation and trailing it allmost as if it was paceing it, it left no trail at all,and was moving a little between 11 and 12 oclock,I watched them go behind a cloud and after a few seconds the jet emerged from the other side,but I never saw the gray triangle again,it was a perfect triangle,with rounded corners,it was 20 times larger than the jet it was following! the color of it made me simply think it was a military aircraft,but after looking online I decided to report it to this site.

records.summary: At night I look up at the sky to admire the stars if I am walking home from work at night. This night in particular I was walking from
records.story: At night I look up at the sky to admire the stars if I am walking home from work at night. This night in particular I was walking from my car to my house and stopped to admire the clear night sky.  I had seen a few helicopters over the water which is common because I live near a base and it's not unusual.  I had seen two on my right over the water and heard the helicopters I could clearly tell what those were. Less than a minute later I saw what I thought was a plane high up moving over my house.  I stared at it ad then it moved back and forth a few times and then moved really fast and disappeared.

records.summary: Bright red flashing moving slow from NNW to the SSE
records.story: Bright red flashing moving slow from NNW to the SSE The object was very bright and red it was moving from the NNW to SSE.  It slowly faded out as it went into the distance.  At first I though it to be space junk burning up in the atmosphere , but because of the direction it was moving I don't think that is possible.  There are no launches down at the Cape so it wasn't that either.  To give aspect on the direction, if staring at the cape the object started about 75 degree to the right and ended about 20 degrees to the right.

records.summary: The 1st sighting was in July 2013 - and this 3rd sighting was 11-25-13
records.story: The 1st sighting was in July 2013 - and this 3rd sighting was 11-25-13 I was sitting on the back porch and relocated to the seat my fiancie was sitting in.  That is when I noticed a object that had an appearance of a star, but had flashing lights. When ((woman's name deleted)) returned outside, I asked her if she noticed this object, she replied, "Yes, I’ve been watching it for about an hour."  Then I got out my phone and turned on the video camera.  At that moment the object lowered behind the tree level.  It rose up and a lot of flashing lights went all around it the our eyes, but on video it shows a object of light shooting off of the one we was recording. It then started moving and stopping, and then lowered again. It came back up and stopped, and then flew away like and airplane would have been flying. This report will be on the local news Nov. 21st 2013. I have seen this object  1st in the north sky right above the tree level.  The 2nd sighting it was me and ((woman's name deleted)) and it was in the west sky, and again right above the tree level.  I called my mother, ((name of 2nd woman deleted)).  And the object moved alittle but that was it, and floated with the sky out of sight.  The 3rd sighting was in the south sky, right above the tree level.  Me and ((womnan #1)) witnessed this one as well.  I tried to video it but this phone’s camera isn’t as good as the other I had. A day right after the 1st sighting that I captured on video, I storm came thru that was like a UFO cloud that I captured on video as well

records.summary: 5 lights in pentagon formation moving extremely fast across sky.
records.story: 5 lights in pentagon formation moving extremely fast across sky. I witnessed 5 lights in a pentagon formation moving swiftly across the sky.   I live right across from the base in Jacksonville, NC.  I see many aircraft in the sky.  They all give off noise.  This object moved roughly 10 times faster than any craft I have seen before.   Didn't give off any noise at all.   I witnessed it for roughly 20 seconds till lost site of it.   Lights were not extremely bright, but object was solid, blocked out stars as it traveled across the sky moving from north to south.

records.summary: I could not have described what me, my husband and daughter witnessed than the description that was posted by someone in St. Cloud, Flo
records.story: I could not have described what me, my husband and daughter witnessed than the description that was posted by someone in St. Cloud, Florida, on 12/23/13.  It was the perfect description of what we saw.  The only thing different was the city and date.  It was one of the weirdest things I've seen in the sky.   I am a star gazer by nature and this was defiantly something I've never witnessed.  New years eve 12/31/13, we ended up seeing three before the night was over.  When you first catch glimpse of it you see this bright orange object cruising across the sky.  The three on New Years night were not as clear to me as the one on 12/29/13.  That one was very clear to me and looked to be on fire.  All I can say is weird.  Very curious to know what they are!! ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to provide no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: ~8 bright orange, almost as if on fire floating orbs coming in off the ocean then disappearing.
records.story: ~8 bright orange, almost as if on fire floating orbs coming in off the ocean then disappearing. ~8 bright orange, almost as if on fire floating orbs coming in off the ocean, no sound, or normal aircraft strobe lights.  Disappearing after reaching inland.   They were moving slowly, and in formation, they then disappeared one at a time shortly after reaching the coast. ((NUFORC Note:  We presume an evening sighting, not morning, and have amended the time above, to reflect that fact.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: 1 rectangular object seen hovering while drifting out of a cloud and after less than one minute went back inside the cloud.
records.story: 1 rectangular object seen hovering while drifting out of a cloud and after less than one minute went back inside the cloud.   2 seconds later in far distance (5 miles?) a black rectangle appeared in the far distance, but was too far to get a good visual. I have 20/15 vision and could see a better picture than than my 8MP camera.

records.summary: Round orange extremley fast moving and silent. Traveling west.
records.story: Round orange extremley fast moving and silent. Traveling west. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Strange Row of Lights Over Jacksonville, Fl.
records.story: Strange Row of Lights Over Jacksonville, Fl My sister and I were coming home at approximately 2 am.  I noticed a row of maybe 5 red lights in the sky that were so perfectly vertical that at first I thought it was a constellation.  Then I noticed another red light approaching the row from the left of the others and it joined the row at the bottom.  That's when I turned off the radio and asked my sister if she thought the lights in the sky were as strange as I did.  She agreed, so I grabbed my phone and we fumbled nervously to record what we saw.  Besides the fact that my sister didn't know how to work the video camera on my phone, the lights were difficult to record because they seemed to move without really moving.  I don't know how to explain it. Once they were in a row, the lights turned from red to orange and kept changing colors.  They never seemed to move but somehow disappeared.  We never heard any noises like we would have if it was a plane or several planes, which we hear often because we live in between a navy base and a commerce center for private/commercial planes. When we got home, I called the non emergency line for our sheriffs office to inquire if there had been any other reports.  I was told no but they would send out an officer if I wanted to file a report.  I declined the report.

records.summary: Big area of blinking light in the sky.
records.story: Big area of blinking light in the sky. I was driving and in the far distance I saw a blinking light.  It looked like it would be coming from a baseball stadium, because it was so bright and it was low to the ground.  I did not see any crafts, but I thought this blinking light was very unusual.   It is a very foggy night with light mist, this made the light stand out to me.

records.summary: Bright disc spotted over east Jacksonville near 295, with aircrafts following.
records.story: Bright disc spotted over east Jacksonville near 295, with aircrafts following. Was outside taking out the trash and saw a strange light in the sky. I had my phone on me so I called my wife who was in the house and told her to get outside.  She was standing by the garage and I was walking back towards the house (about 90 feet).  My neighbor was also outside.  It appeared to be moving towards the ground, vertically towards the area where we live, then prior to it disappearing it moved back towards the sky.  It was bright and disk shaped, no sounds were present. It stayed in one place for a few seconds and then would move erratically in a chaotic pattern, but with no recognizable signature to identify it by any means.  It was not an aircraft, because immediately as this was happening we heard two jets (aircraft of jet-like origin) moving towards the object.  We tried to video tape this with the camera phone but it was too dark, and would not be sufficient for what we saw.  After we heard the jets coming towards the area of the object, it shot ac! ross the sky and disappeared.  The jets continued to make loud noise, but soon after were gone as well.

records.summary: I'm only reporting this because now it happened a second night in a row and my husband saw it this time too and the helicopters and pla
records.story: I'm only reporting this because now it happened a second night in a row and my husband saw it this time too and the helicopters and pla A flash of light skiped thru the sky three times befor disappearing approx 40 seconds later the sky filled with helicopters and planes and on 12-7-13 @ 10:03pm the same happened except the object was going south opposed to north and did not skip just disappeared as on 12-6-13 and again the sky filled with helicopters and planes but this time ot only took 20 seconds for them to come there was 6 in a very close air space!

records.summary: A flash of light that went into a cresent shape before disappearing was seen heading south bound @10:03 pm approx 20 seconds later the
records.story: A flash of light that went into a cresent shape before disappearing was seen heading south bound @10:03 pm approx 20 seconds later the air space in the same region filled with 4 helicopters and 2 planes which circled back and forth the area where the craft was, this was seen on 12/6/13 @ 8:34 except in that instance the flash skipped and was going north in the sky and the helicopters and planes came 40 seconds after but it was in the sky north where that light disappeared.

records.summary: 5 possible meteors traveling in single file.
records.story: 5 possible meteors traveling in single file 5 possible meteors, all traveling the exact same path,  Orange in color,one after the other, travelling south to north. The first two were in the.  Sky at the same time,before the first was completely over the horizon, another appeared. I was taking out the trash when I saw this begin, the neighbor saw it as well.  I got my wife in time to see the last one. They were soundless.  At one point, an airplane at high altitude with its lights on passed underneath it, the object was at least twice the speed of the airplane. Possibly a meteor, but never seen any that color, or ever seen multiple shooting stars ever travel the exact same path before. Coincidentally, my son and his cousin walking to the movies saw at least 2 of them that night as well.

records.summary: Some type of rocket launch.
records.story: some type of rocket launch I was outside yesterday at approximately 10:30 AM.  We heard a loud noise that sort of sounded like a jet.  But it went on so long that I started looking for it.  Then, to me, it started sounding more like a rocket.  I looked in the direction of the Kennedy space center as I often watch launches from there.  And there was indeed what looked like a rocket.  I enjoy trying to catch the take offs from my area when the weather is nice.  So I am usually familiar with what is taking off when because I try to watch for them.  (And sometimes photograph them)  I remembered that SpaceX had tried to take off early in the week and had been delayed but I thought it took off that night before on Dec. 3.    When I got home I did searches and could NOT find anything about any launches at Kennedy. I also checked the schedule of launches from Kennedy and other than one later this month there was nothing scheduled after the Dec. 3 SpaceX launch that had happened the night prio! r.  So after lots of digging I have yet to find anything about this launch.  My guess is it's unpublished NASA launch of a spy satellite or something.  But it definitely was a rocket launch and looked very much like it would if it were from Kennedy Space center. Also immediately after there seemed to be a lot of activity at the NAS Jax. (Tons of military jet planes) The area I was in 32256 is very close to the NAS base (just across the river from it), however, the "launch" was coming from the coast in the South eastern direction.  Again this is the exact direction I have previously watched many NASA launches. I did find, after lots of digging this video-http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BgRzshn_8QI&list=FLgk_WMPAW3xQhP2N9OtTnMA&index=1 .  It sounds and looks just like the launch I witnessed.  (Although I witness, obviously, from a much greater distance).  It was LOUD though even from our area.

records.summary: Three lights were coming together and then the left and right vanished. middle light stayed a moment before vanishing too.
records.story: Three lights were coming together and then the left and right vanished. middle light stayed a moment before vanishing too. We were standing outside when we noticed 3 lights in the sky. They were apart for about 30 seconds and then they were getting closer together.  Then all of a sudden the two lights on the left and right side vanished.  The middle light stayed another minute before it vanished as well.

records.summary: WE WATCHED 2 CANDLELIT LOOKING ORBS IN THE SKY OVER A RESIDENTIAL AREA WHICH THEY SEEM TO HAVE COME IN A LITTLE FAST THEN SLOWED DOWN.
records.story: WE WATCHED TWO CANDLELIT LOOKING ORBS IN THE SKY OVER A RESIDENTIAL AREA WHICH THEY SEEM TO HAVE COME IN A LITTLE FAST THEN SLOWED DOWN, TURNED THEN WENT OUT.

records.summary: Circular glowing disced shaped object
records.story: Circular glowing disced shaped object Me and my girlfriend was driving up my street and we saw a circular object with illuminating green rings around it flying tree line in the air for about 5 minutes then it looked like it landed or disappeared in the woods.

records.summary: White circle shapes moving counter clockwise north west.  ((NUFORC Note:  Advertising lights?  PD))
records.story: White circle shapes moving counter clockwise north west. Four white lights going counter clockwise and meeting up in the center then spreading apart.  Circle shape in the north west area. In the clouds. ((NUFORC Note:  Advertising lights?  PD))

records.summary: Flashing flying object.
records.story: Flashing flying object My boyfriend and I were sitting outside in front of his house, when he asked me to look up at the sky a little distance away and asked me what was that we were seeing.  It looked like a unidentified aircraft with bright flashing lights with multiple colors was slowly moving and then just stopped.   My boyfriend ran into the house and grabbed a pair of binoculars, and he first looked at it and then I did.   What I saw was multiple flashing lights that were the colors of amber, orange, white, red.    I couldn't tell what the shape of it was but I think it was rounded based on the formation of the lights.   We got in his vehicle and started down the street and by the time we got to the end of the street, it vanished.

records.summary: White, star like orb slowly moves across the night sky for 30 seconds.
records.story: White, star like orb slowly moves across the night sky for 30 seconds While walking my dogs I was looking up at 2 stars.  Suddenly, a white oval appeared to the left of one of the stars.  I thought it was another star because it looked like one.  However, the orb slowly moved across the night sky for about 30 seconds and simply disappeared. It had no flashing lights and made no noise.  I have seen these orbs many times before.

records.summary: Black oval craft flying below cloud line making no sounds, displaying no lights & travelling at high velocity.
records.story: Black oval craft flying below cloud line making no sounds, displaying no lights & travelling at high velocity. April 4th, 2014, I was about to return to work after lunch break was over.  I was walking in the door and glanced up in the sky to try and see if it looked like it was going to rain, a Black orb/oval shaped object caught my attention.  The object was flying across the sky horizontally towards the downtown area, the rate in which it was moving looked faster than any fighter jets that i have seen flying. The back object was moving rather fast, however there was no sound or flashing lights like airplanes, jets or helicopters have.  As the object was moving towards the direction of the downtown area (10-15 miles from my workplace), it appeared to rotate mid-air resulting in looking more narrow and smaller than it did when i first noticed.  After a couple seconds in this narrow appearance it rotated again and was back to the first observed shape. From the moment I initially saw the object until it was out of view lasted about 15-20 seconds. There were clouds covering the sky, and I am no expert of the distance of things, but it was well below the cloud line.  My guess is this object had to be between 1,000 feet - 2,000 feet in the air. I rushed inside work to tell my co-workers what I had seen only to get laughed at.  Within a minute of entering the building, my co-workers & myself heard what sounded like 2 fighter jets flying overhead & the sound of the jets was going in the same direction as the object. I do not know what the black orb/oval was that I saw.  The object made  No sounds,  No lights and a fast velocity, which was shortly followed by some fighter jets.  I can only describe the object as a U.F.O,  I'm not automatically assuming Extra Terrestrial, I just can't explain what the object was.

records.summary: Very bright angular object that stayed motionless within eye view; lots of disturbed birds.
records.story: Very bright angular object that stayed motionless within eye view; lots of disturbed birds. ((name deleted))

records.summary: Very bright white light(s) on a stationary object with angular lines.
records.story: Very bright white light(s) on a stationary object with angular lines. Same sighting as reported 6/9/2014 except the object was further away.   Single object in the eastern horizon with a very bright white light or a series of very bright white lights with a dark angular or triangular outline.  Object was stationary.  I did notice a circular aura around the object.

records.summary: We were going to our friends house when we noticed the UFO and stopped to look at it just hovering. It was in broad daylight and all wo
records.story: We were going to our friends house when we noticed the UFO and stopped to look at it just hovering.  It was in broad daylight and all would could see were the 3 lights on both sides.  We watched it for 10 minutes just hovering, no noise at all.  After 10 minutes it just took off.

records.summary: Hovering triangular craft with search lights.
records.story: Hovering triangular craft with search lights. I was driving along the I95N at about 06:45 when I saw something very bright in the sky in front of me.  It was still dark.  At first I thought it might be a star, but as I drew closer I realized it could not be.  As I continued to travel along the freeway I was watching it and it did not appear to be moving.  I considered that perhaps it was a signal light on top of a cell phone tower or similar but I was not aware of any such construction in the area. As I got closer and it came clearly into view, it appeared to be triangular in shape and the size of a large plane.  It seemed to hover and didn’t have any speed like an airplane or jet would.  There was also no audible sound coming from it.  Although I did not lower the windows on my vehicle, I feel sure that had it been a plane of that size I would have heard the roar of the engines. The other thing that struck me as unusual was that it appeared to have search lights on it.  They were very big and round and they faced down, towards the ground, not like the head lights of an airplane.  It did also have a red and green light on it which I understand is used to signal port and starboard on aircraft. I am not sure how many of these search lights were on this triangle as I did not count them, but I would guess at perhaps 6 or 8. I was unable to stop on the freeway, or to take picture whilst I was driving so I took the off ramp and drove around to where I normally park, hoping I would still be able to see it, however by the time I got around the building, I could no longer see the craft. I would very much like to learn what it is that I saw.

records.summary: Orange orbs.
records.story: We saw 8 total orange orbs in the sky near kernan blvd. 4 were in a diamond formation and 4 were coming off the diamond in a line.  They were bright orange, had no sound, didnt move for about 10 min.  Then they just turned off and were gone.  Was hoping someone else saw this but have not heard anything yet. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: White Disc In the Sky:  Viewed From Riverside Avenue.
records.story: White Disc In the Sky:  Viewed From Riverside Avenue So I had a terribly weird morning. I woke up with strep throat, which had started kicking in last night.  I tried all types of medicines and finally gave up and went to the hospital.  After being diagnosed and given my prescription for antibiotics and pain meds, I went to a diner and had breakfast while I waited for the pharmacy to open.  At the diner I check my Facebook page and I read a message from my sister; Dad has cancer and is not going to do chemo.  Then crying.  Then pharmacy to pick up meds, call dad, he is too sick to talk, and eventually drive back home. I am one block from my house though and see this disc in the sky. It is a white disc, oval shaped.  At first I just thought, "what a weird shaped cloud", but then I realized it was moving.  I passed my house and continued down the street to catch a better glimpse of this thing.  I quickly reach for my phone to take a picture and it quickly flies away.   I park at Memorial Park on the river and try to look for it , but it is no where to be seen. This is the second alien sighting I've seen in the last 6 months, and last time I was with two other friends (all of us sober!) who saw it as well.  Last time it also happened that when we brought out our cameras it disappeared, but last time it was flashing different colors and it was also night time instead of daylight . Very interesting.

records.summary: Disc shaped object seen in the middle of the afternoon.
records.story: Disc shaped object seen in the middle of the afternoon. Driving north on highway 17 (Roosevelt blvd) at about 4pm just past NAS Jax towards my left (East) I would say maybe 2 or 3 miles away was a large probably disk shaped object (about the size of my Galaxy s4 held at arms length.  I was traveling at about 60 mph and could not tell if this object was stationary or moving but I think stationary.  I saw it a few times through the tree line until I reached San Juan ave. then it was just gone.   When I first saw it it was level and the last time I saw it it was at about a 15 degree incline (no idea if it was facing down or up as the shape was very uniform).   I was not the only driver to see it as I noticed other drivers trying to get a picture of it (I tried but was unable to get it without stopping and there was too much traffic to just stop).  I honestly have no idea what this thing could have been.   This just happened 25 minutes ago and I fine with you contacting me if you need to.

records.summary: Blue green ufo silent.
records.story: blue green ufo silent e and I saw the craft up close it used a beam of light and stared at us flying irregular it was so close but made no noise had bright blue green puffy light asscended lighting fast then descended between Hodges and kernan I know its no drone it was silent n very close scared the hell outta me.....it stared us down with light beam. ..all 3 phones/cameras quit working ...have video after it crossed road of it slowly decending if interested

records.summary: Looking up  in sky saw round circle orbit like.not a star...no way.  A airplane before it and one after we're with it.  It moved quite
records.story: Looking up  in sky saw round circle orbit like.not a star...no way.  A airplane before it and one after we're with it.  It moved quite fast and then disappeared between both planes.

records.summary: Driving west down J Turner Butler Boulevard (by the intercostal area) we glanced up to see a white ball of light, standing still over t
records.story: Driving west down J Turner Butler Boulevard (by the intercostal area) we glanced up to see a white ball of light, standing still over the St Johns river.  It began traveling very quickly away from us horizontally- headed north.  It slowed down and sped up quickly and made impressive distance in a very short amount of time.  It appeared to also slightly dip and soar upwards smoothly a few times.  I kept my eye on it the entire time it was in view until it got so far away that it became hard to find through the trees.  It was pure white with no blinking lights or anything else that would make me believe it was an airplane or helicopter. Was amazing to see!

records.summary: 2 red lights disappear behind mountain.  5 jets follow behind.
records.story: 2 red lights disappear behind mountain. 5 jets follow behind. 9:30pm Saturday, September 20th.  Two circular red lights resembling star hover above a mountain on new liberty road in pleasant valley area. Both hovered glimmering a red tint just as some stars do.  A jet came by over my house as it is in a flight path.  As the aircraft approached the mountainside the ufo on the right slowly descended behind the mountain until out of sight.   As the aircraft got closer the ufo to the left slowly dropped to the treeline, hovered there a few seconds, and dropped behind the mountain out of sight.   In a five minute window afterwards five planes came flying by in the directon of the ufos.

records.summary: Bright light on Hodes BLvd fast flying close not plane or helicopter.
records.story: bright light on Hodes BLvd fast flying close not plane or helicopter Driving on JTB towards jax beach at 8:30 PM on 9.28.14 I saw a blue/red/pink/purple looking light going way up and down above the tree tops, in the area of beach blvd. At first I thought it was a helicopter. But the object moved so fast. It dove down and right back up and swirled around, way too fast and too bright to be a helicopter. It was not a plane either. I knew that from the start. It did not have the right shape or fly like one. As I turned on to Hodges blvd I continued to watch this light rise and fall in the sky. It would go way up in the air maybe 100 or 1000 feet and then fall right back down fast and zoom back up.  When I made it to my home my family got in the car with me and we drove toward beach blvd to try to find what it was. As we turned onto Hodges again we saw the ball of light zooming around.  It flew over the Windsor realty office and when we got in the turn lane to get closer it flew above our vehicle, about 10 feet above us. And then we pulled into Cape House and it zoomed away from us. It seemed to hover 20 feet away and above from us. I took out my camera phone and tried to get a video but the quality is horrible. As I started to film it I felt like it was watching us. It was so weird and then my husband took my phone from me and tried to zoom in on it and lost the light in the image. Then it zoomed up over the cape house office building. So we drove into Cape House Apts. Trying to ! find where it had gone but we never saw it again. We drove around for about 20 minutes trying to find it again. Got home at 9:20 PM. So It ended at about 9:00 PM.  We thought if it wasn’t government or alien then maybe someone had a gas powered flying toy that they modified with blue/red/pink lights. I don’t understand why no one else driving around noticed this thing and tried to find it too. It was so bright and flying so close and all over Hodges Blvd.  I want to say it was maybe a foot long of light but I couldn’t get a good view of it because of the bright light. It was so fast. I have no idea what it is. The lights did not blink. It was like a bright ball of light maybe a foot wide. NO sound. After the ball disappeared a Plane came by flying kind of low and we wondered if that was government coming to find out what it was too. Or maybe the plane had dropped a drone in that area. I'm stumped. The light seemed clear but we couldn't tell what it was attached too couldn't see anything but the light.

records.summary: Orange/Red UFOs.
records.story: Orange/Red UFOs. I was on San Jose Blvd turning to Baymeadows Rd.  The second I turned onto Baymeadows Rd, I saw over 30 big bright orange/red circles right above the tree line.   I couldn't believe what I was seeing, so I made a u turn to capture it on video.  When I pulled over, there were 50+ above me and some were moving fast, some just disappeared and than others appeared.  They were moving together and were going around in circles around San Jose and Baymeadows Rd.   When I took the first few pictures my battery was at 37%, and out of no where while I was recording the video, my phone dropped down to 2% and about 10 of those same objects  came right above my car and turned from a red color to white and made a horrible static sound.

records.summary: ((HOAX??))  I finally have it on tape.
records.story: I finally have it on tape. I finished giving my dog a bath outside in the front yard and I looked up in the sky and there is a object with blue and red lights flashing really fast.  I  heard a helicopter in the distance, but when the sound went away and the object was still in the sky, I knew it was not a helicopter.  The movement that the object was making was not of a helicopter or plane.   I left my home to follow it, and when I got to a close enough location it disappeared and appeared on the other side of the street in different colors.  Now it was flashing green and yellow lights.  It dropped below the tree line and didn't appear again. ((NUFORC Note:  Possible hoax, we wonder.  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  Hence, we are unable to invite the individual to forward the photographic evidence to our Center, which he/she has not done.  PD))

records.summary: At a glimpse while driving on 9a headed towards San Jose before the Phillips hwy exit,there was a black egg/cigar shaped object with gr
records.story: At a glimpse while driving on 9a headed towards San Jose before the Phillips hwy exit, there was a black egg/cigar shaped object with grey spiral design (about the size of a small economy car) that shot straight up out of the trees.   This happened in a matter of seconds.

records.summary: Orange oval object, hovering in one place for about 30 secs, then makes a large circle and vanishes.
records.story: Orange, oval object, hovering in one place for about 30 secs, then makes a large circle and vanishes I was driving, people were shooting fireworks behind me, but I saw something hovering about 200 yards above me.   It was oval and bright orange, and was not moving, which is what caught my eye.  I stopped the car and tried filming it.  I only got about 20 seconds worth of footage, but what I captured was the orange oval rising in the sky.  It made a circle then vanished.

records.summary: Dark black saucer hovering over tree line.
records.story: Dark black saucer hovering over tree line 1 noticeably dark black craft hovering just above tree lines, still hovering as I write this!  Noticed 3 lights come on then go off..   It was very cloudy out this morning, but the craft was very noticeable.

records.summary: I saw 3 objects  one was flaming red with 4-6 flames beneath the other 2 were just red lights
records.story: I saw 3 objects  one was flaming red with 4-6 flames beneath the other 2 were just red lights I was heading south on a residential drive in westside jax fl to go to the store, looking forward driving I noticed a bright ball of red flame with 4-5 flames coming down from bottom of the flaming ball.   Since this was New Year's Eve, I thought the object was some fireworks but had no sound.   I slowed down to look at object ahead of me and I noticed the two other objects, a total of 3.  Being in  communication technologies I thought it was a radio tower but realized there were no towers by the house in this direction.  They were in a triangle formation.   The object that was flaming was the top left (east) of triangle.  The other two, one was to the right (west) horizontal to the flaimng one.  The third was below the other 2 and in a center position.   As  I turned left there were several couples with children walking , they were all looking and pointing at the objects.   As I ended the street I lost sight of the 3 objects due to trees and houses. I took a right turn an! d saw the flaming object still in the same place.  The other 2 objects were gone.   People walking on Blanding blvd were also looking and pointing at the object too.  I was not the only one who saw this.  The flaming one stayed stationary till I reached the next light.  The object was still flaming, then it moved toward the east at a fast pace and was gone.  It did not go away in a flash.  This all occured just 1 air mile away from Naval Airstation Jacksonville (NAS JAX)

records.summary: Shiny, metal, objects flew over my house.  I have video.
records.story: Shiny metal objects flew over my house, I have video. I was outside flying a quadcopter and looking up and spotted a group of shiny objects heading Northeast at a fairly fast rate.  They were "dancing" around each other including going backwards, I assume they were slightly above cloud height.  There was no sound, although I can't hear aircraft at that height either, they clearly were not aircraft or balloons.  I ran and grabbed my cell phone and recorded about a minute of it.

records.summary: While laying in bed, I looked out of the window and saw a set of what looked like four lights hovering in the sky.
records.story: On 01/25/15 at 9pm while laying in bed I looked out of the window and saw a set of what looked like four lights hovering in the sky. The lights were in a rectangular shape and larger and brighter than the surrounding stars. I witnessed several planes (more than ten and a very loud helicopter)fly by the area where the lights were so I could tell it was not a plane.  It was very big, very bright, very still and very quite. Now my neighborhood has alot of dogs and is normally a bit noisy, but since seeing and watching the lights in the sky it was absolutely silent outside. After about two and a half hours of watching the sky the lights appeared to shift into what looked like one light that wasn't as bright as the four. The lights then began to move slowly behind my house out of my sight to which I ran outside to see how far it had moved, and it was gone. I continued to watch the sky for about thirty minutes, as I was still stunned and shocked that the enormous light had disappeared so quickly. I also noticed that the planes that were flying by had stopped as well.  By this time its 11pm and I went to bed.

records.summary: Silent bright orange sphere moving south to north at various speeds maybe 500 feet above tree line.
records.story: Silent bright orange sphere moving south to north at various speeds maybe 500 feet above tree line. ((NUFORC Note:  Date may be flawed, but witness remains totally anonymous, so we have no way of contacting him/her to verify the date.  PD))

records.summary: I was sitting on my porch and I took a picture of some flowers. When I looked at the picture and zoomed in I noticed a small saucer.
records.story: I was sitting on my porch and I took a picture of some flowers. When I looked at the picture and zoomed in I noticed a small saucer like object in the distance.   The object has something protruding from underneath it.  It is hard to make out in the photo, but at the time that I took the photo, there were no sounds of any aircraft around my house.  When I looked up again the craft was gone. ((NUFORC Note:  Object appears to us to be an insect in flight, possibly a cicada.  PD))

records.summary: Smooth silver sphere in cloudless blue sky hovering at about 300 feet.
records.story: Smooth silver sphere in cloudless blue sky hovering at about 300 feet On a cloudless day, in the middle of the afternoon, I was in the backyard of my in-laws house by the pool, talking to my husband who was about 40 feet away in the yard.  I looked up to admire the sky and was surprised to see a silver sphere sitting stationary in the sky about 390 feet above me.  It was shiny silver, looked like a pinball from a pinball machine except it was a brighter metal, like silver.   I could not discern any movement at all as I watched it, saw nothing that appeared to anchor it, saw no exhaust, etc.  It was fascinating.   Having grown up with access to a naval base, I am familiar with military craft, and this was nothing like an aircraft.  It also did not resemble any craft I have seen out of NASA, and did not resemble a balloon, blimp, or any other known craft I could think of.  If anything, I thought maybe it was a new type of drone, but I haven't seen a military or civilian one that was a perfect sphere like this was.   I turned to call my husband! so he could witness it and when I looked back up maybe a second later it had vanished.  No contrail, no clouds to disappear into, fairly open horizon, and I searched the sky trying to locate it again, but it was nowhere to be seen.  I have never seen a plane vanish that quickly.   It made no sound, I observed no lights or color changes, may have had a slight haze around it, but if so it was so minor it caused little to no distortion of the craft or air surrounding it.  I did not feel threatened by it, more surprised and curious.   There had been a plane that passed by at a much higher altitude and at a different point in the sky several minutes earlier, but it and its contrails were already gone, and I saw one or two several minutes later, and the were also at higher attitudes at different points and had contrails.   Date and time of day are not exact because I didn't report it right away.  We were not using electronics so observed no issues with them. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Green golf ball sized ball that was moving VERY fast and then disappeared a second later.
records.story: Green golf ball sized ball that was moving VERY fast and then disappeared a second later. We were driving east down highway 202, around the exit for Southside blvd.  Me and my fiancee looked up in the sky and both saw the same thing:  A large green, low flying ball, about the size of a golf ball from its altitude.  It moved VERY quickly from north to south and then just disappeared, as if it had just blown up.  We didn't hear anything and it was gone as soon as it appeared. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: On the night of November 9th, I saw a singular U.F.O come across the sky. The U.F.O was moving at rate faster than any plane or aircraf
records.story: On the night of November 9th, I saw a singular U.F.O come across the sky.  The U.F.O was moving at rate faster than any plane or aircraft I've seen.  The object had a light blue aura surrounding it, the aura had a tail as well.  The tail was about 1/5 of total lenth. It appeared rectangular with a rounded front. It stared from the north west traveling south west. When it passed the rear seemed to have two white lights emitting out from it.  Appeared to be similar to a torch flame. 30 - 40 seconds later we heard a low grumble.  Shorty after seeing the U.F.O planes began to cross hatch the sky.  There was approximately 5 - 8 planes in a large spread over the close area of the sighting.  The planes then moved further out and back over the area for a time more than 30 minutes

records.summary: Heard the same event as another report
records.story: Heard the same event as another report In reading  http://www.nuforc.org/webreports/123/S123930.html  I wanted to report that my Girlfriend, brother and I (as well as our 4 dogs, all of whom were disturbed by the sound) all heard a very low and abnormally long grumble sound the evening of Nov. 9th that caused us to go outside and try to identify its source.  The mentioned report's description and time match what we heard, although we never saw anything (I reported that it was approx 8pm, but I am afraid that I don't remember exactly... Jeopardy was over... I remember that for sure).   I can not stress enough how odd this sound was - both audibly and in duration.  I think we must have heard the same thing your witnesses did.  Probably no reason to post this as we didn't see anything but I wanted to let you know.

records.summary: ((HOAX??)) I stepped outside during night hours and look up to the sky, because I'm a skeptic.  Started seeing these odd white lights.
records.story: I stepped outside during night hours and look up to the sky, because I'm a skeptic.  Looked around and starting seeing these odd white and orange/red flashing lights shaped things flying like gravity in steady motion and others could move fast saw little line beams of light as if shooting eachother I'm guessing.  Looking at the sky the next night I sew fear of them but they just float around.  I tried to search for anyone else who might have knowledge of what they are but few mindless people think they are drones as an excuse...naive people open your eyes (finally seeing the truth of what's going on around us)

records.summary: 2 side-by-side green lights moving super fast and were super loud.
records.story: 2 side by side green lights moving super fast and were super loud. Super fast moving and loud.. Enough that it shook the house.  Two flying very close to each other and looked like jets but each only had one green light on the bottom. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Football field-sized aircraft with bight, green lights hovered for 2,5 minutes.  Video shows lights flashing like sending a code.
records.story: Football field-sized aircraft with bight, green lights hovered for 2,5 minutes.   Video shows lights flashing like sending a code. Large aircraft (size of a football field) with bright, greenish lights rose from behind the trees and hovered in the same spot for almost 2.5 minutes.  The aircraft appeared and disappeared at a high rate of speed, faster than any aircraft I am aware of while working in the aerospace industry.   Although the lights appeared to the naked eye to be solid and not blink, the video shows white lights blinking intermittently as if they were sending a code.   The two people I have shown the video to are a retired federal agent and defense subcontractor which both have stated the aircraft was not of this world.

records.summary: I noticed the moon had a ring around it and then saw a multi colored object in the sky.
records.story: We had a rare power outage last night at approx 04:30.  I was unable to sleep so walked out to the back yard.  I noticed the moon had a ring around it and then saw a multi colored object in the sky.  It was changing colors rapidly.  It hovered in that spot for maybe a minute or two.  It then just zipped away going up in a very quick and sudden movemwnt.

records.summary: Pulsating white light on flying object that hovers in same area for a long time.  ((NUFORC Note:  Possible sighting of Sirius?  PD))
records.story: Pulsating white light on flying object that hovers in same area for a long time. This is the 2nd time a pulsating object has been seen in the same part of the sky in the past 2 weeks.  This object appears to hover and has pulsating white light that appears to move around the object.  There is also a noticeable blue light that is only seen sometimes.   My first encounter was about 2 weeks ago and I quickly went to get my husband and was also joined by my daughter.  We all agreed it was not a plane or helicopter.  On this occasion, I noticed another smaller pulsating light to the right of the first one.  I don't know how long either of them stayed as I only watched for around 30 minutes.   Last night, I showed both my parents, this was after my husband and daughter both viewed it first.  My dad said it could be military and it might be over water.  It was quite a distance away.  We watched for around 15 minutes.  The object never moved. ((NUFORC Note:  Possible sighting of Sirius?  PD))

records.summary: A floating ball of light that zig-zag's at light speed leaving a light trail.
records.story: A floating ball of light that zig-zag's at light speed leaving a light trail. I was traveling back from Ohio to Florida and it was dark outside.  I was in the back seat watching the stars as we were driving and listening to music when all of sudden i see a bright light about 10 above a 30-40 foot tree. It was a ball,  The color was orange. I could tell it was moving at about 30-40 mph as we were traveling at 70 Mph on a freeway and it was moving by slow.  After we passed it I shouted at my sister to look and she looked back and as she looked back we saw the ball zig-zag SUPER fast.  It was so fast it left a light trail, then fade away.  She saw it too as she said "Wow!"  I tried recording it but i just couldn't pull my phone up to do it, something wouldn't let me.
